Waffles are, quite simply, the most perfect breakfast food. — KD

Design is about compromises

Design is about compromises — Logitech has a new super-slim wireless keyboard. I like the colors and the marketed durability, but I’m skeptical about actually typing on keys that thin. Will there be any tactile feedback, or are you better off just using the on-screen keyboard?

Published 29 October 2014

Enjoy your day.
